arStrings.szText: While {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}, the explosion of {c_important}Frozen Orb{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_27}  * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
{c_important}Frozen Orb's{/c} explosion restores {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} Mana when hitting a {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemy.

{c_important}Frozen Orb's{/c} explosion has a {c_number}[{SF_31} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to make all enemies hit {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_32}{/c} seconds. {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies are always made {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.
